content:
The enemy once again used the criminal tactics of striking drones over residential and industrial areas of Odessa and suburbs.

About thisreportedDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

It is noted that it posed a real threat to peaceful residents while complicating the work of the air defense.

In the Odessa district at night, the hostile "Shahaneda" was damaged by the building of the recreational object.

The fire occurred, but the fire was quickly eliminated. The health facility does not operate from the beginning of a full -scale invasion.

Also in the recreational area there were damage to a private house with a pier and outbuildings.

According to preliminary data, there are no victims.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine at nightknocked down 18 out of 22 "Shahmed"which attacked the Odessa region.
title: Defense forces told about the criminal tactics
description: This was reported by the defense forces of southern Ukraine. It is noted that created real ...
